documentation.title: SlideMenuChild Class [PHP]
documentation.metadescription: KoolSlideMenu is very Easy-to-Use PHP Slide Menu. Based on Semantic rendering, Advanced CSS together with natural Sliding effect, KoolSlideMenu is Super Fast in rendering, Highly Appearance-Customizable and Elegant Behaviors, all making it stand out to be Excellent Choice for your Site Navigation
documentation.metakeywords: php menu, php slidemenu,php slide menu, ajax menu, php ajax menu,sliding menu, vertical menu

property.name: id
property.shortdesc: Get or set id of slidemenu child
property.longdesc: Get or set id of slidemenu child

property.name: text
property.shortdesc: Get or set text of slidemenu child
property.longdesc: Get or set text of slidemenu child
property.samplecode: <?php $child = new SlideMenuChild("child"); $child->text = "This is child";//Set the text content ?>

property.name: link
property.shortdesc: Get or set link of slidemenu child.
property.longdesc: Get or set link of slidemenu child.
property.samplecode: <?php $child = new SlideMenuChild("child"); $child->link = "childpage.php";//The browser will go to "childpage.php" when the child is clicked ?>

property.name: target
property.shortdesc: Get or set target of slidemenu child link.
property.longdesc: Get or set target of slidemenu child link.
property.samplecode:
<?php
	$child = new SlideMenuChild("child");
	$child->link = "childpage.php";
	$child->target = "_blank";
	//The browser will go to "childpage.php" on blank page when the child is clicked
?>
